panels.description: Displays all time request count served by this API service. This will also include the error requests.
panels.title: All Request Count

panels.description: Displays all time error count occurred within this API service
panels.title: Error Count

panels.description: Displays the request rate received by cluster during the selected time period. This will also include error requests.
panels.title: Request Rate

panels.description: Displays the error rate occurred at this cluster during the selected time period.
panels.title: Error Rate

panels.description: Displays 95th and 50th percentile of response times served by all nodes of this cluster
panels.title: Response Time
